bio:
Lob is an Orsimer blacksmith who can be found living in the Orcish Stronghold of Largashbur.
Lob can follow the Dragonborn after completing "The Cursed Tribe." It is possible that Lob will be killed by giants during the quest. He proves to be an effective fighter and often makes use of any and all two-handed weapons. He prefers to wear light armor.
name: Lob
